summary: Simple edit of Stenvars hair and facialhair
descriptionHtml:
I just edited Stenvar's hair and facialhair so he would be hairier and more barbarian/crazy looking (to me atleast).

Stenvar is purely Bethesda's™ work, and this simple mod should work with most mods, but not with any other mod that changes Stenvar's appearance.

I made the mod for personal reasons. But I felt like since this community has been giving me so much, it was time to give something back.

The new style is partially based on the Game of Thrones™ character Tormund Giantsbane played by Kristoffer Hivju.

ENB in Screenshots are Somber ENB Lut Sepia: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41465/?
author: Kilen9999
